channel.title: Kivy on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in Kivy on Memo Tut

item.title: IOS application development with Python (kivy) that can be done by monkeys
item.description: #Introduction Python, which is active in the field of machine learning and data science, has a simple GUI, and kivy used this time can make applications that can be run on desktop, Android, or iOS by building it. This time, I will give a simple explanation for those who have not made an application but know Python to some extent. Not even a memorandum to yourself. .. What is #kivy One of Python’s libraries that allows you to easily create a GUI (Graphical User Interface: not a black console screen).

item.title: I tried to imitate Python Ã— Kivy de Kinoppy (Kinokuniya bookstore application)
item.description: This article is the 14th day of [Personal Development Advent Calendar 2019](https://qiita.com/advent-calendar/2019/private-development). And Qiita’s first post. Begin. I am creating a Windows app using a framework called Python x Kivy. ###background I cooked a paper book and made it into PDF. Refreshing! -Now read on your iPad -My child took an iPad… -I bought a Surface! Let’s read on Surface -Unlike iPad, there is no good app for Windows -Kinoppy (Kinokuniya bookstore app) Good!

item.title: Make a drawing quiz with kivy+PyTorch
item.description: #Summary This article is the second day of Docomo Advent Calendar. Do you know the drawing quiz? It is a quiz in which the questioner draws a picture and guesses what other people are drawing. There are many apps. If you recognize the image drawn by the user and guess it, you can play it alone, so PyTorchofthemachinelearninglibrarywillcontinue.//pytorch.org/)andkivy, a library that can create apps, will be combined. What is # kivy?
